trans-unit.source: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et sett med tilgangsrettigheter gitt eller nektet for en bruker eller gruppe.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The SemaphoreAccessRule class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on named system semaphores.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SemaphoreAccessRule er blant et sett med klasser som .NET Framework gir for å administrere Windows access control sikkerhet på navngitte system semaforer.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of these classes, and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en oversikt over disse klassene og deres forhold til den underliggende Windows access control-strukturen kan <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Windows access control security is meaningful only for named system semaphores.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Windows access control sikkerhet er betydning bare for navnet system semaforer.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> object represents a local semaphore, access control is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>objektet representerer en lokal semafor, tilgangskontroll er relevant.</xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>

trans-unit.source: To get a list of the rules currently applied to a named semaphore, use the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> object, then use its <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAccessRules%2A> method to obtain a collection of SemaphoreAccessRule objects.
trans-unit.target: For å hente en liste over regler som er aktivert for en navngitt semafor, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å få en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>objekt, og bruk den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAccessRules%2A>metode for å hente en samling SemaphoreAccessRule objekter.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAccessRules%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> </xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SemaphoreAccessRule objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary access control list (DACL).
trans-unit.target: SemaphoreAccessRule objekter tilordner ikke en med tilgangskontrolloppføringer i den underliggende detaljert tilgangskontrollisten (DACL).

trans-unit.source: When you get the set of all access rules for a semaphore, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries.
trans-unit.target: Når du får settet med alle tilgangsregler for en semafor, inneholder settet det minste antallet regler for øyeblikket må express alle tilgangskontrolloppføringer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Underliggende tilgangskontrolloppføringer endre som du bruker, og Fjern regler.

trans-unit.source: The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen i regler slås sammen hvis mulig hvis du vil beholde det minste antallet tilgangskontrolloppføringer.

trans-unit.source: Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added.
trans-unit.target: Derfor når du leser gjeldende liste over regler, kan den ikke se nøyaktig som listen over alle regler som du har lagt til.

trans-unit.source: Use SemaphoreAccessRule objects to specify access rights to allow or deny to a user or group.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SemaphoreAccessRule objekter til å angi tilgangsrettigheter til å tillate eller avslå for en bruker eller gruppe.

trans-unit.source: A SemaphoreAccessRule object always represents either allowed access or denied access, never both.
trans-unit.target: En SemaphoreAccessRule objektet alltid representerer tilgang eller nektet tilgang aldri begge.

trans-unit.source: To apply a rule to a named system semaphore, use the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en regel til en navngitt systemsemafor ved bruk av <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å få den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> </xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Modify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to reattach the security object.
trans-unit.target: Endre den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>objektet ved hjelp av metodene å legge til regelen, og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å knytte security-objektet.</xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Changes you make to a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> object do not affect the access levels of the named semaphore until you call the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to assign the altered security object to the named semaphore.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Du endrer en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>objektet påvirker ikke rettigheter til en navngitt semaforen før du kaller den <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å tilordne det endrede sikkerhetsobjektet til navngitt semaforen.</xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>

trans-unit.source: SemaphoreAccessRule objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: SemaphoreAccessRule objekter er uforanderlig.

trans-unit.source: Security for a semaphore is modified using the methods of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity> class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhet for en semafor er endret ved hjelp av metodene for den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>klassen for å legge til eller Fjern regler; som du gjør dette, underliggende tilgangskontrolloppføringer er endret.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreSecurity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Security on synchronization objects is not supported for Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sikkerhet på synkroniseringsobjektene støttes ikke for Windows 98 eller installasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule"></xref> class, specifying the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule"> </xref> klasse, angi brukeren eller gruppen som regelen gjelder for tilgangsrettigheter, og om de angitte tilgangsrettighetene er gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: To enter a <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>, for example by calling the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method, a user must have <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> access.
trans-unit.target: Angi en <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>, for eksempel ved å kalle den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>metoden, må du ha <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName>tilgang.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>

trans-unit.source: To exit the semaphore, by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A> method, the user must have <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> access.
trans-unit.target: Avslutte semaforen, ved å kalle den <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>metoden, må brukeren ha <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName>tilgang.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren eller gruppen som regelen gjelder for.

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> or a type such as <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> that can be converted to type <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Må være av typen <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> eller en type som <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"> </xref> som kan konverteres til typen <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights"></xref> values specifying the rights allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights"> </xref> verdier som angir rettighetene gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values specifying whether the rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> verdier som angir om rettighetene som er gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: eventRights specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: eventRightsangir en ugyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: -or- type specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: - eller - type angir en ugyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- eventRights is zero.
trans-unit.target: - eller - eventRights er null.

trans-unit.source: identity is neither of type nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .
trans-unit.target: identityverken typen eller en type som som kan konverteres til typen .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule"></xref> class, specifying the name of the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule"> </xref> klasse, angir navnet på brukeren eller gruppen som regelen gjelder for tilgangsrettigheter, og om de angitte tilgangsrettighetene er gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: To enter a <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>, for example by calling the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> method, a user must have <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> access.
trans-unit.target: Angi en <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>, for eksempel ved å kalle den <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>metoden, må du ha <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName>tilgang.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>

trans-unit.source: To exit the semaphore, by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A> method, the user must have <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> access.
trans-unit.target: Avslutte semaforen, ved å kalle den <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>metoden, må brukeren ha <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName>tilgang.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to creating an <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> object, by passing `identity` to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor, and passing the newly created <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> object to the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule.%23ctor%28System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, tilsvarer oppretting av en <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>objektet ved å sende `identity` til den <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktøren og sende den nyopprettede <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>objekt i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule.%23ctor%28System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule.%23ctor%28System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType%29> </xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> </xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>

trans-unit.source: The name of the user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på brukeren eller gruppen regelen gjelder for.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights"></xref> values specifying the rights allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights"> </xref> verdier som angir rettighetene gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values specifying whether the rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> verdier som angir om rettighetene som er gitt eller nektet.

trans-unit.source: eventRights specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: eventRightsangir en ugyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: -or- type specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: - eller - type angir en ugyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: eventRights is zero.
trans-unit.target: eventRightser null.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- identity is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: - eller - identity er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: -or- identity is longer than 512 characters.
trans-unit.target: - eller - identity inneholder over 512 tegn.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.
trans-unit.target: Henter rettighetene gitt eller nektet ved tilgangsregelen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule> objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule>objektene er uforanderlig.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: You can create a new access rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>, but you cannot modify an existing access rule.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en ny tilgangsregel som representerer en annen bruker annen rettigheter eller en annen <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>, men du kan ikke endre en eksisterende tilgangsregel.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights"></xref> values indicating the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights"> </xref> verdier som angir rettighetene gitt eller nektet ved tilgangsregelen.
